thread.title: New year, new you? You can make it happen if you stick to one new habit at a time. Here's how
thread.title_full: New year, new you? You can make it happen if you stick to one new habit at a time. Here's how

author: Suzanne Harrington
title: New year, new you? You can make it happen if you stick to one new habit at a time. Here's how
text:
New year, new you? You can make it happen if you stick to one new habit at a time. Here’s how
We all run headfirst into January with notions of healthy living before the wheels come off. But it doesn’t have to be this way, if you look at Andromeda Godfrey’s ‘Just One Habit’
Here we go. The magical-thinking season of ‘new year, new you’ is upon us, where we tell ourselves that we are going to reinvent ourselves from the ground up to be fitter, smarter, richer, hotter. Physically, intellectually, financially, spiritually, socially – everything is up for improvement.
We tell ourselves we will go to the gym nine times a week, cook everything from scratch three times a day, sign up for meditation, yoga, t’ai chi. Take up bridge, golf, crochet, Pilates. Train for a marathon, learn Japanese, read everything on the Booker long list. Overhaul our finances so that this time next year, like Del Boy, we’ll be millionaires.
